text: No one had ever touched her breasts. They had a perfect seriousness in their chest. They were reserved for dying idle on the lonely tree. He didn't know the new, intact breasts he was carrying, the honey breasts he had in his hands. On their wedding night, that woman must have been looking for a lover who would know. What an irreparable loss! That night, like every other night, the precious breasts lost their fragrance in the hands of the orange dealer. FIN
title: Los senos cuyo valor desconoce el dueño
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
